events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. This mix-up is quite disappointing.
The customer has reported receiving an incorrect item and requested a refund. Case categorized under Refund.
Assigning the case to refund processing team for further assistance and resolution.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I understand you received the wrong item and would like a refund. Let me assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and upload a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 987654321, and I have attached the photo showing the incorrect item that arrived.
We have verified your details and photo. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. You do not need to return the wrong item.
I appreciate the quick resolution and the refund process without needing to return the item. Thank you for your help.
The refund has been successfully initiated and the case is now resolved. Please allow some time for the transaction to reflect in your account.
Checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything is in order now. Thanks again for the excellent customer service!
Closing case as refund was successfully processed and confirmed received by the customer.
